channel.title: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?
channel.description:
How do I do this?
Making non-tradeable items, tradable for certain players...?

item.title: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Something along the lines of
if Playername != “blah blah blah”
tradeable = false

}
Not exactly this, but something close.

Read full topic
item.source: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?

item.title: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

yea u can make the command and have certain user names in it, and if you want only certain people to be able to wield the item or wear it u can put the item with the rest of requirments and put the variable with it

say if i want only donators to be able to wield whip

case 4151
c.isdonar= 1
and your else statment i think.

Read full topic
item.source: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?

item.title: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

^------ He is right ( Sohail is too,)
You can have rights something like this: 8 = Owner , 7 = Co-Owner ,6= Moderators ,5= Player Moderators ,4 = Donators, 3= Normal Player ,2= Mute, & 1= Ban.
If you set items so that only users with the rights of ‘8’ can use them/have them, then only the owner ( which is you ) can use / access the items.
There might be a guide/ snippet around here for you to use ^^ If I find one, I will post it. Beat me to it I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: Non-tradable items tradable for certain players?
